adjectives.description: hedgy (comparative hedgier or more hedgy, superlative hedgiest or most hedgy)

entries.meaning: Pertaining to or like a hedge.
examples: A long hedgy path led through the woodland to the house.

entries.meaning: Indecisive, hesitant, noncommittal, unwilling to take a side.
examples: He remained hedgy until he knew exactly what was being asked of him.
